com.king.base.adapter.holder

类 ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.king.base.adapter.holder.ViewHolder

  • public class ViewHolder
extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    通用的ViewHolder 继承 RecyeclerView.ViewHolder 主要是为了通用性更强
